sentence.Network_en: These rootless young people have nowhere else to go.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些漂泊不定的年轻人没有其他地方可去。

sentence.Network_en: She had had a rootless childhood moving from town to town.
sentence.Network_cn: 她小时候居无定所，在各地流浪。

sentence.Network_en: His faith in himself had been shattered and now he felt rootless and adrift.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的自信心已经崩溃,此时此刻,他觉得自己犹如一叶浮萍,不知飘向何方.

entry.tran: 居无定所的;无固定工作的;无归属的;漂泊的
entry.def: If someone has no permanent home or job and is not settled in any community, you can describe them as rootless .

example.ex: These rootless young people have nowhere else to go.
example.tran: 这些漂泊不定的年轻人没有其他地方可去。

example.ex: ...people who refused to integrate within society and instead lived rootless, jobless lives.
example.tran: 那些不愿意融入社会而过着漂泊不定、没有工作的生活的人

means.word_mean: 1. wandering aimlessly without ties to a place or community;

auth_sentence.content: Our fear is that many people become rootless.
auth_sentence.res_content: Our fear is that many people become rootless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Our fear is that many people become rootless.

auth_sentence.content: Koestler was the prototype of the rootless cosmopolitan.

auth_sentence.content: No matter how rootless and cheap street life might be, you could still be broken by departures.
